title: VerificationRequest

businessName.title: Businessname
businessName.description: Name of the business; there are no specific formatting requirements

corporateWebsite.title: Corporatewebsite
corporateWebsite.description: A URL, including the scheme, pointing to the corporate website

businessCity.title: Businesscity
businessCity.description: The city of the business address; the first letter should be capitalized

businessState.title: Businessstate
businessState.description: The full name of the state (not the 2 letter code) of the business address; the first letter should be capitalized

businessZip.title: Businesszip
businessZip.description: The ZIP code of the business address

businessContactFirstName.title: Businesscontactfirstname
businessContactFirstName.description: First name of the business contact; there are no specific requirements on formatting

businessContactLastName.title: Businesscontactlastname
businessContactLastName.description: Last name of the business contact; there are no specific requirements on formatting

businessContactEmail.title: Businesscontactemail
businessContactEmail.description: The email address of the business contact

businessContactPhone.title: Businesscontactphone
businessContactPhone.description: The phone number of the business contact in E.164 format

messageVolume.description: Estimated monthly volume of messages from the given phone numbers

phoneNumbers.title: Phonenumbers
phoneNumbers.description: The phone numbers to request the verification of

useCase.description: Machine-readable use-case for the phone numbers

useCaseSummary.title: Usecasesummary
useCaseSummary.description: Human-readable summary of the desired use-case
useCaseSummary.example: This is a use case where Telnyx sends out 2FA codes to portal users to verify their identity in order to sign into the portal

productionMessageContent.title: Productionmessagecontent
productionMessageContent.description: An example of a message that will be sent from the given phone numbers

optInWorkflow.title: Optinworkflow
optInWorkflow.description: Human-readable description of how end users will opt into receiving messages from the given phone numbers
optInWorkflow.example: User signs into the Telnyx portal, enters a number and is prompted to select whether they want to use 2FA verification for security purposes. If they've opted in a confirmation message is sent out to the handset

webhookUrl.title: Webhookurl
webhookUrl.description: URL that should receive webhooks relating to this verification request

description: The body of a tollfree verification request
